mapper.sql: id_card, repay_card_id, biz_order, user_name, optimal_return, min_payment, past_due, current_overdue_times, cumulative_overdue_times, card_balance, gmt_create, gmt_modify, feature, status
mapper.insert: insert into repayment_record (id_card, repay_card_id, biz_order, user_name, optimal_return, min_payment, past_due, current_overdue_times, cumulative_overdue_times, card_balance, gmt_create, gmt_modify, feature, status) values (#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optimalReturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pastDue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cumulativeOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update repayment_record
biz_order = #{bizOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optimal_return = #{optimalReturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
min_payment = #{minPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
past_due = #{pastDue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_overdue_times = #{currentOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cumulative_overdue_times = #{cumulativeOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_balance = #{cardBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and repay_card_id = #{repayCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update repayment_record set biz_order = #{bizOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optimal_return = #{optimalReturn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, min_payment = #{minPayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, past_due = #{pastDue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_overdue_times = #{currentOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cumulative_overdue_times = #{cumulativeOverdueTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_balance = #{cardBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, feature = #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and repay_card_id = #{repayCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.biz_order, a.user_name, a.id_card, d.loan_amount, a.optimal_return, a.past_due, a.cumulative_overdue_times, a.gmt_create FROM repayment_record a LEFT JOIN loan_order b on a.biz_order=b.id LEFT JOIN loan_financial_plan d on b.loan_financial_plan_id=d.id LEFT JOIN loan_base_info c on b.loan_base_info_id=c.id where c.partner_id=#{partnerId} and c.area_id=#{areaId} ;

SELECT a.*, d.loan_amount, (select name from partner where id=c.partner_id ) name, d.bank_period_principal, d.loan_time, e.mobile
FROM repayment_record a LEFT JOIN loan_order b on a.biz_order=b.id LEFT JOIN loan_financial_plan d on b.loan_financial_plan_id=d.id LEFT JOIN loan_base_info c on b.loan_base_info_id=c.id LEFT JOIN loan_customer e on b.loan_customer_id=e.id where a.biz_order=#{orderId};
